title: Hilltop Mediterranean Island Stay Close to Stylish Palma
description: Immerse yourself in the Mediterranean lifestyle of the Balearic Island of Majorca - off the coast of mainland Spain - at the five-star GPRO Valparaiso Palace & SPA, a luxury resort set in lush tropical gardens with one of Spain's largest spas and breathtaking mountain and sea views. Your escape includes daily breakfast, authentic Spanish tapas, a welcome drink each on arrival and more.
offer_address: Carrer Francesc Vidal Sureda, 23, 07015 Palma, Illes Balears, Spain
